alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Santa Monica Mountains; Ventura County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 5:46AM PST until February 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Malibu Coast, Santa Monica Mountains and Los Angeles County Beaches. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Santa Monica Mountains; Ventura County Beaches
